Bits and Bobs

Listen to Harry Potter and the Sacred Text!

--- About! ---

I used Jekyll to make this blog, and it was really fun! If you’re comfortable with coding, you might have a good time playing around with it!

The fonts on the site are Montserrat for the titles and Cousine for the body text; both are free on Google Fonts.

The colors on this site are from the Solarized color scheme. They’re supposed to be easiest on the eyes. Probably they’d be even easier on the eyes if I went with the beige background, but if Ethan Schoonover doesn’t do that, then why should I?
